item.title: a bit about me
item.description: Welcome! I’m Harsha - I go to Duke, where I study math and computer science. Among many things, I’m interested in healthcare and understanding how people think (and how to optimize it). One of my dreams is to build a firm designed for everyday people like you and me, that can democratize inaccessible and uninterpretable tools to complement our everyday decision-making. I’m a fan of heuristics, and often rely on its simplicity to make sense of disorder and unpredictability.

item.title: what i've done (in progress)
item.description: Data Science Intern at Redhorse Corporation Predictive Modeling for Disease State Using NGS Data Protein Localization Classification Using Multi-Channel Microscopy Images Twitter Analytics Research for Dallas Mavericks Machine Learning Software Development Data Scientist at Hirschey Lab Duke Applied Machine Learning
